text: unkalukku munnal irunta camutayankalil inta pumiyil kulappankalai tatukkak kutiya arivutaiyor iruntirukkak kutata? Mikak kuraivakave tavira (avvaru irukkavillai.) Avarkalai nam kapparrinom. Yar aniyayam ceytarkalo avarkal tankal cellac cerukkaiye pinparrukirarkal; melum kurravalikalakavum iruntarkal
